mapper.select: select sid, roleid, screatedate, sdeleteyn, aconfirmyn, aconfirmfinalyn, sconfirmyn, spass, sname, sphone, sloc, slocx, slocy, slocshort, sintro, smodifydate, sclosingdate, sopeninghour, sclosinghour, sdeposit, smealfee, lunch, dinner, swebsite, sfoodstyle, smphoto, to_char(sdeposit, 'L999,999') sdepositString, to_char(smealfee, 'L999,999') smealfeeString, to_char(lunch, 'L999,999') lunchString, to_char(dinner, 'L999,999') dinnerString from shop where sid = #{sid}
select to_char(sdeposit, 'L999,999') sdeposit, to_char(smealfee, 'L999,999') smealfee, to_char(lunch, 'L999,999') lunch, to_char(dinner, 'L999,999') dinner from shop where sid=#{sid}
select count(*) loginResult, SID, SPASS, ROLEID from shop where SID = #{sid} and SPASS = #{spass} and ROLEID = 'SHOP' group by SID, SPASS, ROLEID
select count(*) from shop where SID = #{sid} and SPASS = #{spass}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP(SID, ROLEID, SCREATEDATE, SDELETEYN, ACONFIRMYN, ACONFIRMFINALYN, SCONFIRMYN, SPASS, SNAME, SPHONE, SFOODSTYLE, SLOC, SLOCX, SLOCY, SLOCSHORT, SMPHOTO) VALUES('S_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_SHOP_SID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), 'SHOP', SYSDATE, 'N', 'Y', 'N', 'N', #{spass}, #{sname}, #{sphone}, #{sfoodstyle}, #{sloc}, #{slocx}, #{slocy}, #{slocshort}, #{smphoto})
mapper.select: select sid, roleid, screatedate, sdeleteyn, aconfirmyn, aconfirmfinalyn, sconfirmyn, spass, sname, sphone, sloc, slocx, slocy, slocshort, sintro, smodifydate, sclosingdate, sopeninghour, sclosinghour, sdeposit, smealfee, lunch, dinner, swebsite, sfoodstyle, smphoto from shop where sid = #{sid}

SELECT PARKING, VALET, CORKAGE, ADULTONLY, SOMMELIER, LETTERING, RENTALS, SID, PARKINGDESC, VALETDESC, CORKAGEDESC, ADULTONLYDESC, SOMMELIERDESC, LETTERINGDESC, RENTALSDESC FROM FACILITY WHERE SID=#{sid}
select sid, photo1, photo2, photo3, photo4, photo5, sphoto1, sphoto2, sphoto3, sphoto4, sphoto5 from shop_photo where sid=#{sid}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOP SET SCONFIRMYN='Y', ACONFIRMFINALYN='N', SINTRO=#{sintro}, SOPENINGHOUR=#{sopeninghour}, SCLOSINGHOUR=#{sclosinghour}, SCLOSINGDATE=#{sclosingdate}, SDEPOSIT=#{sdeposit}, SMEALFEE=#{smealfee}, LUNCH=#{lunch}, DINNER=#{dinner} WHERE SID=#{sid}

UPDATE SHOP SET SCONFIRMYN='Y', ACONFIRMFINALYN='N', SINTRO=#{sintro}, SOPENINGHOUR=#{sopeninghour}, SCLOSINGHOUR=#{sclosinghour}, SCLOSINGDATE=#{sclosingdate}, SDEPOSIT=#{sdeposit}, SMEALFEE=#{smealfee}, LUNCH=#{lunch}, DINNER=#{dinner} WHERE SID=#{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FACILITY( SID, PARKING, VALET, CORKAGE, ADULTONLY, SOMMELIER, LETTERING, RENTALS ,PARKINGDESC ,VALETDESC ,CORKAGEDESC ,ADULTONLYDESC ,SOMMELIERDESC ,LETTERINGDESC ,RENTALSDESC ) VALUES( #{sid}, #{parking}, #{valet}, #{corkage}, #{adultonly}, #{sommelier}, #{lettering}, #{rentals} ,#{parkingdesc} ,#{valetdesc} ,#{corkagedesc} ,#{adultonlydesc} ,#{sommelierdesc} ,#{letteringdesc} ,#{rentalsdesc} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.RID, R.RMODIFYDATE, R.RMODIFYTIME, R.RTABLETYPE, R.GUESTNUMBER, R.RREQUEST, R.RPHONE, R.MID, M.MNAME FROM RESERVATION R, MEMBER M WHERE R.MID = M.MID AND R.SID = #{sid} AND R.RMODIFYDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YY-MM-DD')+1
